about_the_game:
Getting to remote hunting grounds can be difficult by car and take forever on foot. The brand new Kawasaki UTVs are perfect with their ability to traverse steep slopes and rugged terrain. The Kawasaki Pack gives you 2 Universal Terrain Vehicles, The Teryx and the Mule in 2 color variations each.

The 2-passenger Teryx recreational side x side lineup is built to deliver the adventure of a lifetime. We’ve engineered a perfect balance of performance, capability, and comfort that always ends up with Good Times on the trails.

The MULE PRO-FX™ side x side is a powerful, high-capacity vehicle that's as durable as your days are long. With excellent performance for both work and play, it's the perfect work companion with all-day comfort and strong, dependable performance.

content_descriptors.notes:
It is a realistic hunting game.
Animals are shot and killed with rifles, blood splatters are displayed on the ground.
Animal anatomy and the hit by the bullet are shown in the shot review. Animals are displayed as taxidermized trophies in the hunting lodge.

The MULE PRO-FX™ side x side is a powerful, high-capacity vehicle that's as durable as your days are long. With excellent performance for both work and play, it's the perfect work companion with all-day comfort and strong, dependable performance.
